title: New: Cloud Boat – I Left for a Reason (It Escapes Me Now)
content: The formally R&S affiliated pop group Cloud Bout have a new single, “I Left For a Reason (It Escapes Me Now)“. It’s a rich, sometimes angst ridden but ultimately tender affair. “The river fell away, and washed me down” belts Tom Clarke repeatedly throughout the tracks main section; transforming the most dramatic of moments into slow motion poetry.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
